00025 class ObexResult
00026 {
00027     public:
00028         enum ErrorCode {
00029             // Success
00030             Success                     =   0,
00031 
00032             // Spontaneous events
00033             ObexError                   =   1,
00034             OperationAborted            =   2,
00035             TransportDisconnected       =   3,
00036 
00037             // Errors related to an operation
00038             OperationAlreadyRunning     =   8,
00039             OperationAlreadyComplete    =   9,
00040             OperationNotSupported       =  10,
00041             OperationNotPermitted       =  11,
00042             InvalidHeadersInRequest     =  14,
00043 
00044             // Errors caused by lack of resources
00045             ResourceNotAvailable        =  16,
00046             OutOfMemory                 =  17,
00047 
00048             // Server-specific errors
00049             ServerAlreadyOpen           =  32,
00050             ServerAlreadyClosed         =  33,
00051             ServerAlreadyKnown          =  34,
00052 
00053             // Client-specific errors
00054             ClientAlreadyOpen           =  64,
00055             ClientAlreadyClosed         =  65,
00056 
00057             // Internal errors
00058             InvalidHeaderId             =  96,
00059             UnknownMimeType             =  97,
00060             ObjectNotWritable           =  98,
00061 
00062             // OBEX Url parsing errors
00063             SyntaxErrorInUrl            = 128,
00064             UnknownParameterInUrl       = 129,
00065             InvalidParameterInUrl       = 130,
00066 
00067             // API function errors
00068             InvalidExecutionContext     = 192,
00069 
00070             // Unspecified error
00071             Unspecified                 = 255
00072         };
00073 
00075         static inline   ObexResult  Ok();
00076 
00081         inline          ObexResult(ErrorCode  e = Unspecified);
00082 
00084         inline          ObexResult(const ObexResult &  from);
00085 
00087         inline          ObexResult &    operator=(const ObexResult &  from);
00088 
00090         inline          BOOLEAN         IsError() const;
00091 
00093         inline          BOOLEAN         IsOk() const;
00094 
00099         inline          operator        BOOLEAN() const;
00100 
00102         inline          ErrorCode       GetErrorCode() const;
00103 
00104     private:
00105         ErrorCode       m_code; 
00106 };
00107 
00108 
00109 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00110     Ok
00111     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00112 ObexResult  ObexResult::Ok()
00113 {
00114     return  ObexResult(Success);
00115 }// Ok
00116 
00117 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00118     ObexResult
00119     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00120 ObexResult::ObexResult(ErrorCode  e) :
00121     m_code( e )
00122 {
00123 }// ObexResult
00124 
00125 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00126     ObexResult
00127     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00128 ObexResult::ObexResult(const ObexResult &  from) :
00129     m_code( from.m_code )
00130 {
00131 }// ObexResult
00132 
00133 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00134     operator=
00135     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00136 ObexResult &    ObexResult::operator=(const ObexResult &  from)
00137 {
00138     // Self - assignment doesn't hurt here, so we don't check for it !
00139     m_code = from.m_code;
00140     return *this;
00141 }// operator=
00142 
00143 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144     IsError
00145     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00146 BOOLEAN ObexResult::IsError()
00147 const
00148 {
00149     return (m_code != Success);
00150 }// IsError
00151 
00152 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00153     IsOk
00154     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00155 BOOLEAN ObexResult::IsOk()
00156 const
00157 {
00158     return (m_code == Success);
00159 }// IsOk
00160 
00161 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00162     operator BOOLEAN
00163     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00164 ObexResult::operator BOOLEAN()
00165 const
00166 {
00167     return IsOk();
00168 }// BOOLEAN
00169 
00170 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00171     GetErrorCode
00172     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00173 ObexResult::ErrorCode   ObexResult::GetErrorCode()
00174 const
00175 {
00176     return m_code;
00177 }// GetErrorCode
